mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(boardseq, title, content, fk_userid, registerdate, password, commentcount, viewcount, status, orgfilename, filename, filesize) values(seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{fk_userid}, default, #{password}, 0, 0, default, #{orgfilename}, #{filename} , to_number(#{filesize}))
